anchors.name: Gym Buddies
anchors.description: Steady gym traffic all day. Lifters, cardio, crews warming up. Easy place to find a workout partner or jump into a set. Always a few people in here between classes.

anchors.name: Study Buddies
anchors.notification_message: Willis is filling up for night study. Slide in before seats disappear.
anchors.description: Consistent study flow. Groups forming, quiet grinders, people doing homework between lectures. Reliable place to link with classmates.

anchors.name: Union Main Floor
anchors.notification_message: Union is heating up for lunch traffic. Good spot to link or chill between classes.
anchors.description: Lunch crowds, clubs tabling, people chilling between classes. Good spot to find friends, link for food, or meet someone fast.

anchors.name: Let's Grab Lunch
anchors.notification_message: Lunch rush starting at Eagle Landing. If you're grabbing food, people are already here.
anchors.description: Lunch rush. High movement, lots of tables full. Good time to meet new people or grab food with someone nearby.

anchors.name: Basketball Runs
anchors.notification_message: Pickup runs forming at the Rec. Courts are getting active.
anchors.description: Pickup runs throughout the day. People warming up, games forming, waiting list building. Easy to hop in.

anchors.name: Dinner Time
anchors.notification_message: Dinner crowd warming up at Eagle Landing. Easy to find a seat or meet people now.
anchors.description: Dinner warm-up phase. People rolling in after classes, light chatter, more open tables. Easy opportunity to sit with others.
